trans-unit.source: <properties pageTitle="Signing in to the mobile app using a verification code with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication" description="This page will describe how a user can signin using a mobile app verification code with Azure MFA." services="multi-factor-authentication" documentationCenter="" authors="billmath" manager="stevenpo" editor="curtland"/>
trans-unit.target: <properties pageTitle="Signing in to the mobile app using a verification code with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication" description="This page will describe how a user can signin using a mobile app verification code with Azure MFA." services="multi-factor-authentication" documentationCenter="" authors="billmath" manager="stevenpo" editor="curtland"/>

trans-unit.source: <tags ms.service="multi-factor-authentication" ms.workload="identity" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="08/24/2015" ms.author="billmath"/>
trans-unit.target: <tags ms.service="multi-factor-authentication" ms.workload="identity" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="08/24/2015" ms.author="billmath"/>

trans-unit.source: The following information will describe the experience of using multi-factor authentication with your mobile app when you are using it with a verification code.
trans-unit.target: The following information will describe the experience of using multi-factor authentication with your mobile app when you are using it with a verification code.

trans-unit.source:
• Sign in to an application or service such as Office 365 using your user name and password.
  • Microsoft will prompt you for a verification code.
trans-unit.target:
• Sign in to an application or service such as Office 365 using your user name and password.
  • Microsoft will prompt you for a verification code.

trans-unit.source: • Open the Azure Authenticatior app on your phone and enter the code in the box where you are signing in.
trans-unit.target: • Open the Azure Authenticatior app on your phone and enter the code in the box where you are signing in.
